abstract: Stephan Maigaard Andersen (born 26 November 1981) is a Danish professional football player, who plays as a goalkeeper for Go Ahead Eagles in the Eredivisie, on loan from Real Betis. He is also a full international for the Denmark national football team and was chosen to represent his country at UEFA Euro 2004, the 2010 FIFA World Cup and UEFA Euro 2012.
